description: This is a React component representing a page for creating or editing a recipe. It fetches existing recipe data when editing, manages form submission for creating or updating recipes, and displays a form with appropriate loading states.

methods.name: RecipeFormPage({ mode = 'create' })
methods.description: React functional component managing the recipe creation/edit page, including data fetching, form handling, and navigation.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, calling API methods for creation or updating, and navigation upon success.
